alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 6:48AM CST until January 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing/Drifting snow impacts expected at times, especially in open country. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Clay County. In North Dakota, Cass County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
